sentence: Lowe's Companies, Inc. ( LOW ) will begin trading ex-dividend on July 20, 2015.
A cash dividend payment of $0.28 per share is scheduled to be paid on August 05, 2015.
Shareholders who purchased LOW prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 21.74% increase over the prior quarter.
At the current stock price of $68.23, the dividend yield is 1.64%.
The previous trading day's last sale of LOW was $68.23, representing a -10.52% decrease from the 52 week high of $76.25 and a 44.51% increase over the 52 week low of $47.22.
LOW is a part of the Consumer Services sector, which includes companies such as Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) and Sherwin-Williams Company ( SHW ).
LOW's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $2.79.
Zacks Investment Research reports LOW's forecasted earnings growth in 2016 as 23.06%, compared to an industry average of 20.6%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the LOW Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
